DOC.brief_summary: This randomized multi-center study is intended to compare different coatings on stents for treatment of lesions of the above-the-knee femoropopliteal artery.
DOC.brief_title: Paclitaxel-coated Peripheral Stents Used in the Treatment of Femoropopliteal Stenoses
DOC.criteria: One de novo or restenosed artherosclerotic lesion with â‰¥ 50% diameter stenosis Symptoms of peripheral arterial disease (Rutherford 24) Pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning to become pregnant in the next 5 years Less than 18 years old Medical condition or disorder that would limit life expectancy to less than 12 months or that may cause noncompliance with the protocol or confound the data analysis Previous stent in the study vessel
